title: Is there any alternative to blogging in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course. All sorts of social media are alternatives to blogging. Here’s the thing, though. Writing long pieces on Facebook is a strain to read because its formatting is not conducive to 300 or 500 words. And having to read a string of tweets I find personally irritating. If you can say it on a 15-second TikTok, then do it, but if you want to SAY something more substantial, it’s not the forum.
